name: Thisplay
description:
Thisplay is a platformer game. You control Onit, a display monitor, as you try to pass multiple quality checks before he will be shipped as a product.

Featuring:
- sliding, wall sliding, jumping, double jumping, wall jumping, and dashing
- 4-color palette
- 5 themes with 4 levels each
- time and death score

Controls:
- A to move Left
- D to move Right
- K to Jump
- L to Dash

--

Thank you for playing!

- Made in 7 days by Drakenjey.
- Support/Comment /Rate and I'll update the game with new themes and levels.
